66021014	A ma wanker nɖ'ɔ akula rɛɛ-ɔ ya wɛ hiiu na naal, n'a maa ya rɛɛ-ɔ Siiyo tirira mpa wɛ hiiu na naʋl na, wa yela.
66021015	Asɛ tirir ñɩ wʋtʋn-m na, n nɔɔn ɩ rʋken ɩ niiŋ t'ɔ sika kpaɖʋ s'ɩ mɔse kɔrʋ, na kʋ menɛse, na kʋ wanker.
66021016	Kɔrʋ nkʋ wɛ kpɛlen ka nniisa ka, ñɩ wɛ kʋtarʋ nɩ kʋ akutase wɛ kʋtarʋ rerɛ. Asɛ tirir ñɩ mɔse kɔrʋ nkʋ na kpaɖʋ nkʋ, n'ɩ nɔɔn kʋ wɛ akpaya cunkuii ka nawiisi hiiu na nasel (12|#000). Kʋ rɔlɩn taa, na kʋ walɩn taa, na kʋ kʋrɩn taa wɛ kʋɖemte.
66021017	Asɛ tirir ñɩ mɔse wanker na rɔlɩn ñɩ wɛ ɩ ñunkunkɔ, n'ʋ tal ɩ niiŋ nɛse na, n'ɩ nɔɔn ɖe-l wɛ ñunkunkase ka cakɔɩsii na hiin nniisa na nnaʋsa (144). Ɩ mɔse yera wampa mɔsʋʋ.
66021018	A ma wanker nɖe na sarte wɛɛ nɛnyar-ɔna ya wɛ se mɩhaarʋ k'a yaa-ya sɛ sasepe. Kɔrʋ nkʋ teter, kʋ ci sika kɔrʋ kena. Kʋ wɛɛ wɛ rekpesekpese ka reyaya se ñelma.
66021019	A tʋse wanker nɖe akula k'afate, na sarte wɛɛ ka kʋtɛkʋtɛ, kiɖinkiɖin akuɖi na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ sasepe na, taman naʋl akuɖi na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ safiir na, taman nautisi ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ akate na, taman nnaʋsa ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ eemerote na,
66021020	taman naʋna ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ oniikisi na, taman leɖe ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ sartewan na, taman leɖe nasenautisi ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ kiriisoliite na, taman nasennaʋsa ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ peerɩl na, taman nakʋ ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ topase na, taman hiiu ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ kiriisoperase na, taman hiiu na kʋɖem ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ turkiwasi na, na taman hiiu na naʋl ñenɖe na wɛɛ nya a yaa-ya sɛ ameetiisete na.
66021021	Menɛse nse kaɖen ñɩ hiiu na ñɩ nɩɩl ñɩ, ñɩ ci lɛte nte wɛ hiiu na natel na, n'a laʋ pa kaɖʋ nkʋ na, na lɛrʋ ka kʋɖemʋ. Yapar nɖe wɛ kɔrʋ nkʋ taa na, a hɩl-ɖe na sika teter kena reyaya se ñelma.
66021022	Me ta na Asɛ rɛɔ ka kɔrʋ nkʋ taa, wonte rɛɛ na, Acii Sesɛɛ Asɛ Reentencii, na Siiyo nka, wa teter wa wɛ renaa, n'a sɛɛ-wa.
66021023	Ʋ ka ta hɛn mɩse, na honɖɔ, sɛ wa wʋl wa hʋlmɩn ka kɔrʋ nkʋ taa, wonte rɛɛ na, Asɛ hampate wʋlʋ-kʋ hʋlmɩn nɩ Siiyo nka ci kʋ kanɖe.
66021024	Kɔren ten taa yera kaa sɛ wa kaalʋ na kɔrʋ nkʋ hʋlmɩn ñɩ rɛɛ-ɔna. Đen'ɔna, tɛte rɛɛ wursi kaa sɛ se sɩn se sauti.
66021025	Kɔrʋ nkʋ nɔ kaɖen kaa sɛ ñɩ mɩsʋ tarʋm, wonte rɛɛ na, aho pe yii renaa.
66021026	A kaa s'a kan kɔren taa cepate, na wonte ha ñamte na, ka kʋ taa.
66021027	Ama, a kaa s'a ra sɩn tansarteñente ka kɔrʋ nkʋ taa. Wompa hɔya hɔrse ten na, na tentarɩra ra sɩ kʋ taa. Wompa a maa wa yela ka Siiyo nka fiisu tekara taa na, mpa receel kɔŋ-na sɛ wa sɩ kʋ taa.
66022001	Asɛ tirir ñɩ wʋl-m carɔ leem mpe ha yera ka fiisu nkʋ tam akperʋ na, ka pe wɛ receelenceel n'a na pe taa se ñelma, nɩ pe lii n'Asɛ na Siiyo nka, wa wurti kpeeɖe taa.
66022002	Pe kpoŋ kɔrʋ nkʋ taa yapar leekɔ rɛɛ. Tu nkʋ ha yera ka fiisu nkʋ tam akperʋ na, kʋ ñee carɔ, na yapar nɖe, wa hɛkʋ taa. Kʋ lelʋ wii ka hiiu na naal, nɩ pa honɖɔ nka taa na, kʋ lelʋ wiir kʋɖemer. Kʋ haate ci kɔɔr nɖe kʋsʋ kɔren ten taa yera na.
66022003	Sem wɩʋ kaa sɛ pe ra laʋ alape ka renaa. Asɛ na Siiyo, wa wurti kpeeɖe kaa sɛ re wɛ kʋ taa, n'ɩ wolalaɖa kaa sɛ wa sɛɛ-ɩ.
66022004	Wa kaa sɛ wa na ɩ ñesa taa, n'a maa ɩ yeɖe ka wa tirañase rɛɛ.
66022005	Aho kaa s'ʋ ra yii, nɩ kanɖe, na mɩse wa hʋlmɩn ɖa hɛn-wa, wonte rɛɛ na, Acii Sesɛɛ Asɛ kaa s'ɩ yase ɩ hʋlmɩn ka wa rɛɛ, wa-n'ɩ, wa cɔ wurti kpeelɩ rɛɛ-ɔ wʋse se wʋse.
66022006	Asɛ tirir ñɩ siir-m sɛ: "Tentɛnte nte wɛ tʋfelem s'a tisi te rɛɛ. Acii Sesɛɛ Asɛ ñɩ ha ɩ Fiisu ka ɩ tentɛnte rɛsera sɛ wa hose ɩ tentɛnte na, ɩ tir ɩ tirir s'ɩ wʋl ɩ wolalaɖa ka wonte ʋ mɔna sɛ te laʋ kɔhen na."
66022007	Yeesu tam sɛ: "!Ɩɩ co sarte n'ɩɩ nɩʋ. Me kɔŋ kɔhen ñɩ. Woñɩ ñɔŋ tentɛnte nte, a maa-te tekara ñɩ t'ɔ te lii n'Asɛ nɔ taa na, ɩ nɩʋ lelen."
66022008	M'ɔ San, me nɩʋ-te nɩ me na te ten ñɩ na me ñesa. Me nɩʋ nɩ me na-te wonte na, me feete Asɛ tirir ñɩ wʋlʋ-m-te na, ɩ naase tɛɛ sɛ me sɛɛ-ɩ,
66022009	n'ɩ siir-m sɛ: "!Đa laʋ sempe, ma rerɛ, me ci Asɛ wolalaɖe kena se ña-n'n ɖɛɔ ñempa mpa rɛsʋ Asɛ tentɛnte na, na wompa ten ñɔŋ tekara ñɩ taa wʋtase na. !Sɛɛ Asɛ kena."
66022010	Ɩ tase me siiruu sɛ: "!Đa re tentɛnte nte lii n'Asɛ nɔ t'ɔ n maa-te tekara ñɩ taa na, na n taa, wonte rɛɛ na, alʋate ñʋta.
66022011	Woñɩ lake wonte tan ɖiyuyu na, !ɩ rʋken wonte tan ɖiyuyu na, te lape. Woñɩ lake tansarteñente na, !ɩ rʋken ɩ tansarteñente lape. Woñɩ wɛ riyuyu na, !ɩ rʋken ɩ riyuyuñente lape. Woñɩ ci sartetɩ na, !ɩ mɩse ɩ sarteñente taa."
66022012	Ɩ tase me siiruu sɛ: "!Ɩɩ co sarte n'ɩɩ nɩʋ. Me kɔŋ kɔhen ñɩ. Me kɔŋ na me rɛter sɛ me rɛte pa woñɩ na, ka ɩ temer rɛɛ.
66022013	Me ci Alfa na Omeeka. Te kutihuɖi kelɛ sɛ, me ci kiɖinkiɖintɩ n'atɛsenʋtɩ. Me ci kiɖirɛɛtɩ na nɔrɛɛtɩ.
66022014	Wompa yaalʋ wa wɔwen, se fɛ n'a ha-wa ñempʋ sɛ wa sɩ na kɔrʋ nkʋ taa kaɖen nɩ wa tʋ tu nkʋ ha yera ka fiisu nkʋ tam akperʋ na, kʋ wii na, wa nɩʋ lelen.
66022015	Ama, wompa wɛ se haase na, na wompa lake atʋrte ñente, n'ayaɖeteñente na, n'akʋra, na wompa laa atetɩna na, na tentarɩra, na wompa ten wɛ tentarɩr ka lu na, wa kaa sɛ wa mɩse n'awaren ɖɛɛ-ɔna.
66022016	M'ɔ Yeesu, me tir m'Asɛ tirir s'ɩ siir-mɩ te ten ñɩ semp'ɔ kiriisitutɩna akpaya rɛɛ. Me ci wuroo Tafiiti yikee. Me ci ntaʋŋ tɛɛ carʋ nkʋ mɛtelʋ na."
66022017	Asɛ Fiisu, na siiyo yal, wa tɔŋ sɛ: "!Kan." Woñɩ nɩʋ-te na, !ɩ tam ɖerɛ sɛ: "!Kan." Woñɩ lʋkʋte kʋ-ɩ na, !ɩ kan. Woñɩ cii na, !ɩ mʋ leem mpe ha yera ka fiisu nkʋ tam akperʋ na, ka fala.
66022018	Me siiru womɩ ten nɩʋ tentɛnte nte lii n'Asɛ nɔ t'ɔ me maa-te tekara ñɩ taa na sɛ, nne yer tase nter-ɔ te rɛɛ, Asɛ kaa s'ɩ yeʋ n'ɩ tʋ wahala nya me maa-ya tekara ñɩ taa na.
66022019	Nne yer lese nter-ɔ te taa, Asɛ kaa s'ɩ ra yeʋ s'ɩ renke tu nkʋ ha yera ka fiisu nkʋ tam akperʋ na, kʋ wii, n'ɩ ra yeʋ s'ɩ sɩ kɔrʋ sarteñenkʋ nkʋ a maa kʋ ñente ka tekara ñɩ taa na, kʋ taa.
66022020	Woñɩ senɖe te wara sɛ te wɛ tʋfelem na, ɩ siiru sɛ: "Tʋfelem, me kɔŋ kɔhen." !Ʋ laʋ sempe, Acii Sesɛɛ Yeesu, !kan.
66022021	!Acii Sesɛɛ Yeesu laʋ mɩ ten-ɔ sarte.
